title: France evacuates 20 students and artists from Gaza
subhead: The group is due to arrive in Paris on Tuesday. Evacuations had been suspended at the end of July after a young Palestinian evacuee to France was found to have posted hateful and anti-Semitic messages on X.

title: Three exhibitions in Paris celebrate 100 years of Art Deco
subhead: To mark the centenary of the International Exhibition of Modern Decorative and Industrial Arts, three venues are showcasing a leading figure of the movement, the archives of a renowned trunk-maker and contemporary creations.

title: Mohammed Shia al-Sudani, the 'builder' seeking to safeguard Iraq's fragile stability
subhead: As the November 11 legislative election approaches, Iraqi Prime Minister Mohammed Shia al-Sudani, who's running for a second term, has been working to keep his country out of escalating regional tensions.

title: On social media, women share their abortion stories to break the silence
subhead: In the face of misinformation and guilt-inducing rhetoric online, some users have chosen to speak openly about their abortions on these platforms. While sometimes it is simply a desire to share their personal experiences, more often, it remains a consciously political act.
